20101221020648.000|20101221020651.000|CC1|OF ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS A PATH    
20101221020651.000|20101221020652.000|CC1|TO LEGAL STATUS IF THEY ENROLL

20101221020655.000|20101221020656.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE ONLY COUNTRY     
20101221020656.000|20101221020659.000|CC1|THEY HAVE EVER KNOWN, AND ALL   
20101221020659.000|20101221020701.000|CC1|THEY'RE ASKING FOR IS A CHANCE  
20101221020701.000|20101221020703.000|CC1|TO SERVE THIS NATION.           
20101221020703.000|20101221020705.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT THE DREAM ACT IS   
20101221020705.000|20101221020706.000|CC1|ALL ABOUT.                      
20101221020706.000|20101221020710.000|CC1|>> THIS BILL IS A LAW THAT, AT  
20101221020710.000|20101221020715.000|CC1|ITS FUNDAMENTAL CORE, IS A      
20101221020715.000|20101221020717.000|CC1|REWARD FOR ILLEGAL ACTIVITY.

20101221021331.000|20101221021332.000|CC1|POSSIBLE BY GET TO GO THE       
20101221021332.000|20101221021333.000|CC1|CENTER.                         
20101221021333.000|20101221021334.000|CC1|I WOULD EXPECT TO SEE OVER THE  
20101221021334.000|20101221021336.000|CC1|NEXT YEAR SIMILAR MOVES BY HIM  
20101221021336.000|20101221021339.000|CC1|TO SCRAMBLE THE PARTISAN        
20101221021339.000|20101221021339.000|CC1|PICTURE.                        
20101221021339.000|20101221021340.000|CC1|>> Ifill: CYNTHIA?              
20101221021340.000|20101221021342.000|CC1|>> WELL, THERE HAS BEEN MUCH    
20101221021342.000|20101221021342.000|CC1|DEBATE ABOUT WHETHER THE        
20101221021342.000|20101221021345.000|CC1|PRESIDENT IS TRYING TO MOVE TO  
20101221021345.000|20101221021346.000|CC1|THE CENTER.                     
20101221021346.000|20101221021347.000|CC1|THE FACT OF THE MATTER IS THAT  
20101221021347.000|20101221021348.000|CC1|THERE WERE SOME THINGS THAT     
20101221021348.000|20101221021350.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT VERY MUCH WANTED  
20101221021350.000|20101221021352.000|CC1|THAT HE COULD NOT GET UNLESS    
20101221021352.000|20101221021355.000|CC1|HE AGREED TO EXTEND THE BUSH    
20101221021355.000|20101221021356.000|CC1|ERA TAX CUTS FOR THE            
20101221021356.000|20101221021357.000|CC1|WEALTHIEST AMERICANS.           
20101221021357.000|20101221021358.000|CC1|HE WANTED TO EXTEND             
20101221021358.000|20101221021400.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT BENEFITS.          
20101221021400.000|20101221021401.000|CC1|HE GOT THAT.                    
20101221021401.000|20101221021403.000|CC1|HE WANTED TAX CUTS FOR THE      
20101221021403.000|20101221021405.000|CC1|REST OF AMERICANS, FOR MIDDLE   
20101221021405.000|20101221021407.000|CC1|CLASS AND WORKING CLASS         
20101221021407.000|20101221021407.000|CC1|AMERICANS.                      
20101221021407.000|20101221021408.000|CC1|HE GOT THAT.                    
20101221021408.000|20101221021410.000|CC1|HE GOT AN EXPANSE OF THE        
20101221021410.000|20101221021412.000|CC1|EARNED INCOME TAX CREDIT.       
20101221021412.000|20101221021414.000|CC1|SO WHAT HE MANAGED TO GET OUT   
20101221021414.000|20101221021416.000|CC1|OF THIS COMPROMISE IS?          
20101221021416.000|20101221021418.000|CC1|EFFECT A SECOND STIMULUS.       
20101221021418.000|20101221021419.000|CC1|SMALLER THAN THE ORIGINAL       
20101221021419.000|20101221021420.000|CC1|STIMULUS.                       
20101221021420.000|20101221021423.000|CC1|BUT HE NEVER WOULD HAVE GOTTEN  
20101221021423.000|20101221021425.000|CC1|ANYTHING WITH THE NAME

20101221021426.000|20101221021428.000|CC1|THROUGH A REPUBLICAN HOUSE      
20101221021428.000|20101221021430.000|CC1|NEXT YEAR.                      
20101221021430.000|20101221021432.000|CC1|SO THERE ARE REASONS, I THINK,

20101221021547.000|20101221021549.000|CC1|QUARTER OF ALL THE BALLOTS.

20101221021551.000|20101221021554.000|CC1|LEAST 690 THIS YEAR.

20101221021602.000|20101221021604.000|CC1|THE OPPOSITION, AFTER A DISPUTED
20101221021604.000|20101221021606.000|CC1|PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION ON SUNDAY.

20101221021757.000|20101221021758.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: ONCE PRESIDENT     
20101221021758.000|20101221021800.000|CC1|OBAMA SIGNS THE REPEAL          
20101221021800.000|20101221021801.000|CC1|LEGISLATION ON MONDAY, IT WILL  
20101221021801.000|20101221021801.000|CC1|BE UP TO THE DEFENSE DEPARTMENT 
20101221021801.000|20101221021811.000|CC1|TO IMPLEMENT THE CHANGES.       
20101221021811.000|20101221021813.000|CC1|FOR MORE ON HOW THAT WILL       
20101221021813.000|20101221021815.000|CC1|HAPPEN, WE TURN TO BERNARD      
20101221021815.000|20101221021816.000|CC1|ROSTKER, WHO HAS HELD SEVERAL   
20101221021816.000|20101221021817.000|CC1|HIGH-LEVEL PENTAGON PERSONNEL   
20101221021817.000|20101221021817.000|CC1|POSTS IN THE CARTER AND CLINTON 
20101221021817.000|20101221021818.000|CC1|ADMINISTRATIONS, INCLUDING      
20101221021818.000|20101221021820.000|CC1|UNDERSECRETARY FOR MANPOWER.    
20101221021820.000|20101221021822.000|CC1|HE IS A SENIOR FELLOW AT THE    
20101221021822.000|20101221021823.000|CC1|RAND CORPORATION, WHICH HAS     
20101221021823.000|20101221021823.000|CC1|PREPARED REPORTS FOR THE        
20101221021823.000|20101221021825.000|CC1|PENTAGON ON "DON'T ASK, DON'T   
20101221021825.000|20101221021826.000|CC1|TELL."                          
20101221021826.000|20101221021828.000|CC1|AND TAMMY SCHULTZ, THE DIRECTOR 
20101221021828.000|20101221021829.000|CC1|OF NATIONAL SECURITY AND JOINT  
20101221021829.000|20101221021830.000|CC1|WARFARE AT THE U.S. MARINE CORPS
20101221021830.000|20101221021834.000|CC1|WAR COLLEGE.                    
20101221021834.000|20101221021834.000|CC1|THANK YOU BOTH FOR BEING WITH   
20101221021834.000|20101221021836.000|CC1|US.                             
20101221021836.000|20101221021837.000|CC1|PROFESSOR SCHWARTZ, LET ME      
20101221021837.000|20101221021837.000|CC1|START WITH YOU.                 
20101221021837.000|20101221021839.000|CC1|WHAT IS IT THAT THE PENTAGON    
20101221021839.000|20101221021840.000|CC1|IS GOING TO DO NOW, STARTING    
20101221021840.000|20101221021842.000|CC1|NOW TO IMPLEMENT THIS PLAN?     
20101221021842.000|20101221021843.000|CC1|>> WELL STARTING NOW THERE'S    
20101221021843.000|20101221021846.000|CC1|BASICALLY GOING TO BE A REVIEW  
20101221021846.000|20101221021847.000|CC1|TO SEE WHAT SORTS OF            
20101221021847.000|20101221021848.000|CC1|PROCEDURES, LAWS, CODES THAT    
20101221021848.000|20101221021851.000|CC1|NEED TO BE BASICALLY CHANGED.   
20101221021851.000|20101221021852.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY AFTER THAT THERE    
20101221021852.000|20101221021853.000|CC1|WILL BE A CERTIFICATION         
20101221021853.000|20101221021854.000|CC1|PROCESS BY THE CHAIRMAN, THE    
20101221021854.000|20101221021855.000|CC1|SECRETARY OF DEFENSE AND THE    
20101221021855.000|20101221021857.000|CC1|PRESIDENT THAT WILL BASICALLY   
20101221021857.000|20101221021859.000|CC1|CERTIFY THE UNIT COHESION AND   
20101221021859.000|20101221021900.000|CC1|READINESS WILL NOT BE AFFECTED  
20101221021900.000|20101221021901.000|CC1|BY THE IMPLEMENTATION.          
20101221021901.000|20101221021903.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: MY APOLOGIES.      
20101221021903.000|20101221021905.000|CC1|I CALLED YOU SWARTZ.            
20101221021905.000|20101221021906.000|CC1|IT'S PROFESSOR SHULTZ.          
20101221021906.000|20101221021907.000|CC1|>> NOT AT ALL.                  
20101221021907.000|20101221021909.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: BERNIE ROSTKER,    
20101221021909.000|20101221021910.000|CC1|WILL THIS BE DONE IN PHASES?    
20101221021910.000|20101221021912.000|CC1|I MEAN, HOW DO WE LOOK FOR      
20101221021912.000|20101221021913.000|CC1|THIS TO UNFOLD.                 
20101221021913.000|20101221021915.000|CC1|>> I THINK THERE WILL BE THREE  
20101221021915.000|20101221021915.000|CC1|ADDITIONAL EFFORTS.             
20101221021915.000|20101221021917.000|CC1|ONE IS TO PREPARE A CODE OF     
20101221021917.000|20101221021918.000|CC1|CONDUCT THAT WOULD BE           
20101221021918.000|20101221021922.000|CC1|IMPLEMENTED WOUD REGARD TO      
20101221021922.000|20101221021925.000|CC1|SEXUAL ORIENTATION TO ALL       
20101221021925.000|20101221021925.000|CC1|SERVICE MEMBERS.                
20101221021925.000|20101221021926.000|CC1|THE SERVICE MEMBERS THROUGHOUT  
20101221021926.000|20101221021928.000|CC1|THE MILITARY WILL HAVE TO BE    
20101221021928.000|20101221021930.000|CC1|TOLD WHAT IS EXPECTED OF THEM   
20101221021930.000|20101221021932.000|CC1|IN TERMS OF THEIR BEHAVIOR.     
20101221021932.000|20101221021933.000|CC1|AND THEN LEADERS WILL HAVE TO   
20101221021933.000|20101221021934.000|CC1|BE TRAINED.                     
20101221021934.000|20101221021936.000|CC1|IT MAY TAKE SEVERAL MONTHS,     
20101221021936.000|20101221021938.000|CC1|BUT IT CERTAINLY COULD BE DONE  
20101221021938.000|20101221021940.000|CC1|WITHIN A SIX-MONTH PERIOD.      
20101221021940.000|20101221021940.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: WE'RE TALKING      
20101221021940.000|20101221021943.000|CC1|ABOUT DIFFERENT TRAINING FOR    
20101221021943.000|20101221021944.000|CC1|OFFICERS THAN FOR ENLISTED      
20101221021944.000|20101221021945.000|CC1|MEMBERS.                        
20101221021945.000|20101221021946.000|CC1|>> SENIOR ENLISTED AND

20101221023322.000|20101221023323.000|CC1|HURTING THE CUBAN PEOPLE EVEN   
20101221023323.000|20101221023325.000|CC1|MORE.                           
20101221023325.000|20101221023326.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE TWO PROVISIONS IN  
20101221023326.000|20101221023327.000|CC1|THE U.S. EMBARGO THAT COULD BE  
20101221023327.000|20101221023331.000|CC1|DEADLY TO A TRANSITION IN

20101221024022.000|20101221024023.000|CC1|>> WELL, HE DID.                
20101221024023.000|20101221024026.000|CC1|I THINK THE LAWYER              
20101221024026.000|20101221024027.000|CC1|REPRESENTING THE GOVERNMENT     
20101221024027.000|20101221024028.000|CC1|POINTED OUT THAT WE'RE NOT      
20101221024028.000|20101221024029.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT BROCCOLI HERE.    
20101221024029.000|20101221024031.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT TALKING ABOUT SHOES.  
20101221024031.000|20101221024033.000|CC1|WHAT WE'RE TALKING ABOUT IS     
20101221024033.000|20101221024034.000|CC1|ENSURING THAT EVERY AMERICAN    
20101221024034.000|20101221024036.000|CC1|CAN PURCHASE AFFORDABLE         
20101221024036.000|20101221024036.000|CC1|INSURANCE.                      
20101221024036.000|20101221024037.000|CC1|IF WE WANT TO BE ABLE TO DO     
20101221024037.000|20101221024040.000|CC1|THAT AND TO PROHIBIT INSURANCE  
20101221024040.000|20101221024041.000|CC1|COMPANIES FROM BANNING PEOPLE   
20101221024041.000|20101221024043.000|CC1|WHO HAVE PRE-EXISTING           
20101221024043.000|20101221024044.000|CC1|CONDITIONS, YOU KNOW, WHO HAVE  
20101221024044.000|20101221024045.000|CC1|BEEN SICK AND MAKING SURE THAT  
20101221024045.000|20101221024047.000|CC1|EVERYONE CAN GET INSURANCE,     
20101221024047.000|20101221024048.000|CC1|THEN WE HAVE TO GET EVERYONE    
20101221024048.000|20101221024048.000|CC1|IN THE SYSTEM.                  
20101221024048.000|20101221024049.000|CC1|WHAT WE'RE TALKING ABOUT IS A   
20101221024049.000|20101221024051.000|CC1|REQUIREMENT THAT IF YOU CAN     
20101221024051.000|20101221024053.000|CC1|AFFORD TO BUY INSURANCE, YOU    
20101221024053.000|20101221024055.000|CC1|NEED TO MAINTAIN INSURANCE.     
20101221024055.000|20101221024056.000|CC1|THAT'S ALL WE'RE TALKING ABOUT  
20101221024056.000|20101221024056.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20101221024056.000|20101221024058.000|CC1|>> Brown: HOW IMPORTANT IS THE  
20101221024058.000|20101221024100.000|CC1|MANDATE TO THE REST OF THE      
20101221024100.000|20101221024102.000|CC1|HEALTH REFORM LAW?              
20101221024102.000|20101221024103.000|CC1|>> WELL, WE'VE ALREADY BEEN     
20101221024103.000|20101221024105.000|CC1|IMPLEMENTING, AS YOU KNOW, FOR  
20101221024105.000|20101221024106.000|CC1|ABOUT NINE MONTHS NOW AND       
20101221024106.000|20101221024107.000|CC1|WE'VE IMPLEMENTEDED A NUMBER    
20101221024107.000|20101221024108.000|CC1|OF IMPORTANT PROVISIONS SUCH    
20101221024108.000|20101221024112.000|CC1|AS PATIENTS BILL OF RIGHTS,     
20101221024112.000|20101221024115.000|CC1|REQUIREMENTS THAT PLANS ALLOW   
20101221024115.000|20101221024116.000|CC1|ADULT CHILDREN TO STAY ON       
20101221024116.000|20101221024117.000|CC1|THEIR PLANS UNTIL THEY'RE 26.   
20101221024117.000|20101221024119.000|CC1|BANNING RESCISSIONS SO THAT     
20101221024119.000|20101221024122.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T LOSE YOUR INSURANCE   
20101221024122.000|20101221024123.000|CC1|PLANS JUST BECAUSE YOU'VE MADE

20101221024124.000|20101221024125.000|CC1|WE'VE MADE LOT OF CHANGES       
20101221024125.000|20101221024125.000|CC1|ALREADY.                        
20101221024125.000|20101221024127.000|CC1|IT'S A CRITICAL POINT THAT THE  
20101221024127.000|20101221024128.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL RESPONSIBILITY

20101221024130.000|20101221024130.000|CC1|BANNING PRE-EXISTING            
20101221024130.000|20101221024132.000|CC1|CONDITIONS SO IF WE WANT TO

20101221024134.000|20101221024136.000|CC1|PRIVATE SECTOR AND PRIVATE      
20101221024136.000|20101221024137.000|CC1|PLANS WHERE PEOPLE CAN GET A    
20101221024137.000|20101221024139.000|CC1|PLAN EVEN IF THEY'VE HAD A      
20101221024139.000|20101221024140.000|CC1|DISEASE OR CANCER OR ILLNESS    
20101221024140.000|20101221024142.000|CC1|BEFORE, THEN WE HAVE TO HAVE A  
20101221024142.000|20101221024143.000|CC1|REQUIREMENT THAT EVERYBODY GET  
20101221024143.000|20101221024144.000|CC1|IN THE SYSTEM IF THEY CAN

20101221024146.000|20101221024147.000|CC1|>> Brown: BUT WHAT ABOUT THE

20101221024650.000|20101221024651.000|CC1|YOU HEARD HER SAY THAT HEALTH   
20101221024651.000|20101221024653.000|CC1|CARE IS DIFFERENT IN A WAY.     
20101221024653.000|20101221024654.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE IS PART OF          
20101221024654.000|20101221024655.000|CC1|COMMERCE.

20101221024657.000|20101221024659.000|CC1|SHE FEELS, CAN OVERCOME WHAT    
20101221024659.000|20101221024701.000|CC1|THE VIRGINIA JUDGE SAID.
